header.title: Welcome to Tyler Korth Tutoring
header.subtitle: Personalized In-Person Math Support & Coding Lessons

sections.title: Customized Learning
sections.description: Every student’s math journey is unique. I create a personalized plan based on each student’s goals, learning style, and pace. Together, we will:
list: Reinforce core concepts through hands-on practice

sections.title: What a Tutoring Session Looks Like
sections.description: My sessions are always one-on-one and in-person. In each session, we:
list: Identify the specific concepts to focus on (e.g., homework, upcoming tests)
Review foundational skills needed to understand new material
Work through example problems and practice together
Discuss tips, shortcuts, and strategies for mastering the topic

codingFocus.title: Main Focus:
list: Understanding core programming concepts (e.g., variables, data types, conditionals, loops, and functions)

list.name: Downloading python for Visual Studio Code
Downloading Java for Visual Studio Code
Downloading c++ for Visual Studio Code

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: Hello! I’m Tyler Korth, a student at the University of South Carolina (Computer Science major and Business minor) with a passion for logical thinking, problem-solving, and helping students excel. My tutoring approach is hands-on, encouraging, and customized to each student’s pace. Whether it's math or coding, I believe a strong foundation boosts confidence both in academics and real-world problem-solving. I look forward to working with you or your child!

items.question: 1. Where do the sessions take place?
items.answer: I currently provide in-person tutoring in Camden, Lugoff, and Columbia, SCWe can meet in a public location (e.g. library, coffee shop) or at your residence if that’s preferred. I also offer tutoring via Zoom

items.question: 2. How long are tutoring sessions?
items.answer: Typically 60-90 minutes, but flexible to your schedule and needs.

items.question: 3. What if my child only needs help occasionally?
items.answer: That’s perfectly fine! I offer one-time sessions or periodic check-ins as needed.

items.question: 4. What is your availability?
items.answer: I’m generally flexible. Email me or fill out my contact form, and we’ll find a time!

items.question: Rates & Payment
items.answer: My rates vary depending on the subject and level. Payment can be made via cash, check, or digital methods. Contact me for a custom quote!

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.intro: Ready to start or have more questions? Fill out the form that fits your needs:
